item.description:
Hi Everyone,

IT LOOKS LIKE RAIN AND WIND, NOT A GOOD ENOUGH DAY FOR GETTING INTO A YAK

INSTEAD IT MIGHT BE JUST AS EASY TO DO A SIMPLE BACK YARD BARBIE-Q..
IM NOT INTO DRIVING TO NEW FARIFIELD ON A RAINY NIGHT BUT WOULD RATHER KEEP THINGS CLOSE AND EASY.

OK I CHANGED THE TIME TO 5 PM SO YOU CAN DO DAY THINGS..

DIRECTIONS TO MY HOME ARE BELOW..
i am located at 321 Silas Deane Highway, Wethersfield, CT 06109.

From the North:
Follow I-91 south to Exit 28 for combined Routes 5 and 15 south (Wethersfield). Take first exit, Exit 85 (Wethersfield); the exit ramp will merge into Route 99 (Silas Deane Highway) south. Proceed apx 1/2 mile; at the posts with the Orange Tarffick cones turn in and park.
From the East:

From the South:
Follow I-91 north to Exit 24. At the end of the ramp turn right onto Route 99 (Silas Deane Highway) north for apx 3 miles. Look for the posts with the cones


see ya all later if you are interested..
al-r

















The right side had lots of water noise, dont know from what,
the left side seems to head to Bushnell Park, but again, this is more of an explore mission for us since they stopped Huck Fin from having tours, else i would have had that tour for us starting from the beginning,
but if things don' t look good, we just can turn around because we are starting from the exit.




THIS IS THE PERFECT TUNNEL TO PADDLE WITH YOUR HALOWEEN CREATURE SWEETHART.

Eating Hearts is common in these tunnels..sweet or not..

There will be a Barbie-Q of Juicy fat Rats and whatever else floats down the tunnel, DEAD or ALIVE

ITS LIKE THE WATERWAYS OF ROMANTIC GONDOLA'S OFTEN SEEN IN BRO-SHOES BUT RIGHT HERE IN THE HARTFORD AREA.

ITS DARK FOR ALL THE KISSES YOU CAN IMAGINE, ITS HOT EVEN IN THE WINTER TO KEEP YOU FROM SHAKING

and screams of delight echo for hours.

THE TUNNEL IS CALLED "THE PARK RIVER TUNNEL" THAT FLOWS UNDER THE ROMANTIC CITY OF HARTFORD.



IM MOVING THE DATE AROUND SO WE CAN SEE THE MOST CREATURES IN THIS TUNNEL AND WHEN THE WATERFLOW IS BRISK.


Getting to the Launch Point:
From North of Hartford, take I-91 South to Exit 30, I-84 East to East Hartford and Glastonbury. Take Exit 53, East River Dr / Rt 44 and follow the exit ramp signs for East River Dr. At the end of ramp, turn right onto East River Dr. The park entrance is on your right.

From South of Hartford, take I-91 North to Exit 29, Rt 5 / 15 & I-84 to East Hartford and Manchester across the Charter Oak Bridge. Take Exit 90 and bear right at the ramp split following the signs for East River Dr / Rt 2 West. Take Exit 4 off Rt 2 onto East River Dr. At the end of the ramp, turn left onto East River Dr and pass under the highway. The park entrance is on your left.

From East of Hartford, take I-84 West to Exit 54, Downtown Hartford. Take the Darlin St. exit before crossing the Founders Bridge. At the end of the ramp, turn right onto Darlin St. At the end of Darlin St, turn right onto Pitkin St. At the end of Pitkin St, turn left onto East River Dr. The park entrance is on your left.

From West of Hartford, take I-84 East to Exit 53, East River Dr / Rt 44 and follow the exit ramp signs to East River Dr. At the end of the ramp, turn right onto East River Dr. The park entrance is on your right.

Rat Barbie-q is at Silas Deane Highway a bit south of the POLICE Station in Nearby Wethersfield. we can caravan there.

Hot Tub, Fire Pit, whatever else needed..to cook our creatures....LOL

Further details added later closer to the event if necessary..


Kayaks available:

Doughnation of 5 bucks for this close event for any kayaks rented..

Necky Eliza, Short sea kayak 16' with one of the paddles in the bucket= Alex

Blue Riot Tourlite 15', Short Sea Kayak , w/ any Paddle= ?

Yellow Cobra Expidition SOT 18' , Long SOT Sea Kayak with Carbon Kalista 230 bent & small shaft dia Paddle and billie club= AL-R

Im picking this boat since when the rats, roaches and Snakes jump in, i can just grab em and fling them behind me towards you LOL




Red Eddyline Wind Dancer 18', Long sea Kayak with Carbon Kalista 220 bent w/ small shaft dia Paddle= Linda or Steve

Red NDK Greenlander Pro 18' , Fast & Long Sea Kayak with Camano 220 Fiberglass or Wood Greenland Paddle= or similar= Linda or Steve.





al-r
item.how_to_find_us: LOOK FOR RATS EXITING THE TUNNEL, I WILL WEAR MY ORANGE HUNTING HAT AND RIFEL

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: FAT RAT BARBIE-Q instead of ROMANTIC VENITIAN GONDOLLA PADDLE IN THE TUNNEL OF L
